name: v0.2.47.Final
body:
- [**question**] On click "Edit API" - Failed to construct 'WebSocket': The URL's scheme must be either 'ws' or 'wss'. 'https' is not allowed. [#1270](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1270)
- [**question**] Question: APicurio to Existing PostgresqlDB with API Data [#1262](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1262)
- [**question**] unable to login to apicurio-ui [#1257](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1257)
- [**bug**] Microcks Integration does not work with URL starting with https://api [#1250](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1250)
- [**closed**] Doubt: How to check Apicurio is correctly using the database?  [#1243](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1243)
- [**bug**] tried using apicurio to generate api for github openapis [#1227](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1227)
- [**question**] Issues with keycloak auth [#1223](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1223)
- [**closed**] The access to the API seems not properly define in the K8S setttings. [#1219](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1219)
- [**question**] Does APICurio allow you to export OpenAPI specification to a repository? [#1202](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1202)
- [**question**] Helm installation [#1190](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1190)
- [**bug**] API Edits not saving [#1179](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1179)
- [**task**] Clarify quarkus database configuration documentation [#1174](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1174)
- [**closed**] API Edit Lost Connection on Kubernetes [#1171](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1171)
- [**question**] Failed to link user to self-hosted gitlab user. [#1168](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1168)
- [**closed**] Typo in Kubernetes distro instructions [#1167](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1167)
- [**question**] Apicur.io sizing? [#1141](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1141)
- [**bug**] Docker Compose problem with new Quarkus based images [#1130](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1130)
- [**closed**] Shared Docs giving stack trace [#1121](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1121)
- [**bug**] Unable to parse subgroups for Gitlab publishing [#1118](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1118)
- [**closed**] unable to open the editor because a web socket request is hanging [#1116](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1116)
- [**enhancement**][**task**] Migrate microservice impls from Thorntail to Quarkus [#1110](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1110)
- [**question**] Redirect uri issue when app port is changed [#1109](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1109)
- [**enhancement**] Deprecated endpoint not supported [#1104](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1104)
- [**closed**] Error generating javadocs with JDK 13 [#1091](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1091)
- [**bug**] Error in project generation [#1090](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1090)
- [**bug**] Bug #1036 resurfaced [#1087](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1087)
- [**closed**] postgresql secret not created with template [#1077](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1077)
- [**question**] store to git repo on online version [#1043](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1043)
- [**editor**][**enhancement**][**in-progress**] Define a New Data Type: Can't define enum [#979](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/979)
- [**invalid**] apicurio-ws does not output some config information to the log even though the log level is DEBUG [#969](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/969)
